There is no Truth in WinFS. It is a storage of observations about things and actions, @BillGates.
The key point about WinFS is if it is The Store or mere Indexer, @BillGates it can't be former, but shall be more than latter one.
Another thing WinFS needs to have is support for spatial data types with appropriate indexing, @BillGates
Filetables in SQL 2012 are great for file integration and change tracking, but WinFS engine should be smaller, like SQLite, @BillGates
Another thing not present in original WinFS was time awareness, @BillGates. W/o history it isn't sufficient for digital memory functionality
Arena folks were right, @BillGates, - WinFS had to have semantic web-like generalized store, and schematized views on top of it for apps.
Something as big as Cortana but for work. Digital work assistant. Connected to enterprise's social network. Customer for @BillGates WinFS.
But to make WinFS dream happen, @BillGates, one needs first customer to WinFS, and only one (not many). It should be big challenging thing.
Happy birthday, @BillGates! I wish your dream of WinFS become a real thing. I believe it is doable. Happy Birthday!
